Name: Recyclomania
About the game: Play the incredible Match3 game 'Recyclomania'! Katie and her environmentally aware friends Joey, Emi and Steve are truly resolved to keep on recycling until they build recycling plants for all types of recyclable waste. Start off collecting glass, metal, paper, and plastic waste to win new products that help you cure your Recyclomania!
